title: Marathon Digital, Vaxart, Devon Energy: What to Watch in the Stock Market Today
sub_head: Bitcoin-related stocks were ticking higher after the SEC approved an ETF of companies in the crypto sector
body:
Wall Street indexes wavered after the September jobs report showed a smaller increase in nonfarm payrolls than had been forecast. Here’s what we’re watching in Friday’s trading.
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
